name: Mutual Exchange
description:
Entry  for Ludum Dare 44 - "Your life is currency".

Control a human and a demon simultaneously as they make their way to through 3 levels. To overcome the obstacles on their way they must exchange life force between them to increase their abilities.

As the human gives his life force to the demon, his jump abilities increase at the price of his resistance and health.

When the demon returns life force to the human, he increases his weight, allowing him to press heavy switches and walk across heavy winds.

Controls:

Arrow keys -> move

Z -> Jump

X -> Give life to demon

C -> Give life to human

Esc -> Exit the game (Linux and Windows downloadable versions)
